page.title: 01Newport Isle of Wight
page.content: This block covers the whole of the centre of{Newport}the{'capital'}of the I.O.W. {Newport}is the administrative centre of the island containing County Hall, the main Police and Fire stations. It also houses the offices of the Medina Borough Council. The Crown Court is held in the Guildhall. {Newport}is at the head of the river Medina, which flows into the Solent at Cowes. The main road systems radiate from Newport, which also contains the only dual carriageway on the island. {Newport}is the market town of the island and is the main shopping centre. {Newport}is developing a large industrial estate for service industries.
